data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Larix sibirica (Siberian larch) from sample KOZHLASI-81

Exposition E, Slope 50 deg, Geology: Pseudopodsol on clay und ston, Tree line 600 m, av. Tree height 15 m, Tree cover 60%, Shrub cover 90%, Herb cover 60%, Moss cover 90%, Vegatation type: Lariceetum fruticuloso hylocomiosum, Film number: 1009A
